titles.title: Make A Joyful Noise, Unto The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Make a joyful noise, unto the Lord.
Sing the glory of His name,
For the Lord is good, and the Lord is great.
He is greatly to be praised,
My God my King, my rock and my redeemer,
My strength my song, my refuge and my shelter.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cantad alegres a Jehová
Cantad la gloria de su nombre
Grande y bueno es Jehová
Digno de suprema alabanza.
Mi Dios, mi Rey, mi Roca y Redentor
Mi fuerza y mi canción
Mi refugio y fortaleza
